name: Target Race
description:
This is TARGET RACE

This game was made in just 30 minutes.  Rotate and Boost to collect as many targets in 30 seconds.  My personal best is 7!

Controls:

Left / Right Arrow: Rotate the ship

Space: Boost

Credits (Because I had no time to make a home screen):

Color Pallet: IBM 51 - Created by Atari_level_up 

Game Engine: Construct 3

Font: Fredoka One - Designed by Milena Brandao
